en: When you hit the sweet spot on the shooting bar it increaes your field goal percentage and accumulates with combos.

tw: 越接近籃下投籃命中率有越多額外加成。
en: The closer you are to the basket the higher the field goal percentage.

tw: 拖曳移動搖桿到極限，即可開啟加速，可加速至耐力用完為止。

explain: 體力已滿2，購買完後顯示

en: Will not show up again today
Please update to the newest version
Please update from the official site
Please download update form Google Play
Please download update from App Store

tw:
您的資料正送往雲端，除非太陽爆炸，
否則我們將永久為您保存資料。
en: Your data is being sent to the cloud, unless the solar system erupts, we shall store your data for enternity.

tw: 您的體力已全部恢復，快來打一場球吧。
星際摔角界難見的奇才，卻因下級居民的身份只能打假比賽賺取收入。直到某次比賽中失手打敗對方而欠下巨債，家庭破碎。[33FFDD]擁有強壯的體格[-]
en: A talented wrestler in the galaxy but is unable to achieve stardom because he is born in the lower class.  Forced to play in set-up matches for a living he ended up with a huge debt when he accidentally defeated his opponent.[33FFDD]Has a strong and tough built[-]

tw: 原為前途光明的高階星際軍官，意外失去右臂並接受改造卻失敗了，而後淪為政治犧牲品，同時人生盡毀。[33FFDD]擁有高超的命中率[-]
en: He was a high ranked officer in the military.  Lost his right arm in an accident and the robotic arm transplant has also failed him.  His life and career have derailed after his party lost the political wrangling. [33FFDD]Has exceptional range and accuracy[-]

tw: 貧民窟長大的女孩，為了找尋失蹤的父親，跟照顧年幼的弟妹與母親，身兼多職，在星際酒吧練出敏捷的身手。[33FFDD]擁有靈敏的身手[-]
en: Grown up in the ghetto, worked multiple jobs to feed her younger siblings.  Earned great handle and dynamic visual ability while working in the galaxy bar. [33FFDD]Possess excellent agility[-]

tw:
1.影響傳球成功的機率
2.AI模式時，發動alley-oops妙傳的機率
en:
1. Affect Successful Passing Rate 
2. Automatic alley-oops percentage in AI mode.

tw:
1.被敵對衝撞不會倒地的機率
2.AI模式時，發動肘擊的機率
3.增加肘擊的距離與範圍
en:
1. Less chance to fall after being pushed by opponent.
2. Increase the chance of elbowing opponent in AI mode

tw:
1.在禁區內發動灌籃的機率
2.發動補籃的機率
en:
1. Higher percentage to activate dunking ability in the restricted area.
2. Higher percentage to activate tip-in.

tw:
1.發動籃板的距離
2.提高抓到籃板的機會
en:
1. Increase the rebounding zone
2. Increase the chance of getting the rebound

tw:
1.提高蓋到火鍋的機會
2.AI模式時，發動蓋火鍋的機率
3.AI模式時，被投籃假動作騙的機率
4.蓋火鍋時附加撞人機率
en:
1. Increase the chance of blocking shots
2. Increase the chance of blocking shots in AI mode.
3. Increase the chance of faking out your opponent in AI mode.
4. Increase chance to knock down opponent while blocking shots.

tw:
1.抄截成功的機率
2.AI模式時，發動抄截的機率
3.增加抄截的距離與範圍
en:
1. Increase the chance of steal
2. Increase the chance of attempting a steal in AI mode.
Increase the duratioin while running at max speed.

tw:
1.球員區域防守的範圍
2.AI模式時，發動推人的機率
3.增加推人的距離與範圍
en:
1.Size of player's defensive zone
2. Increase the chance of attempting a push in AI mode.
